DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine , presence reduce calorie diet , breakfast containing high quality protein source ( egg ) would effective reduce hunger increase feel fullness compare breakfast contain low quality protein , equal energy density . A previous pilot study endpoint yield borderline significant result ; study power base pilot interrogate hypothesis .
DOC.brief_title: High Quality Protein Assisting With Weight Loss
DOC.detailed_description: This crossover study 2 experiment . Subjects follow reduce energy weight loss diet 1,200-1,500 kcal adjust individual 's body weight totally 2 week experiment . They come clinic day 1 day 5 consume egg breakfast ( EB ) supervision . Then weekend continue breakfast home base advice . The next week cereal breakfast ( CB ) process similar first week . The 1st experiment test satiety egg breakfast ( EB ) follow energy intake lunch dinner , compare CB ( cereal breakfast ) . Lunch dinner offer 2 test day week . Anthropometric body composition measurement , blood pressure , blood draw , satiety questionnaire , well energy intake also collect 2 test day compare 2 breakfast group . The 2nd one test whether EB help resist intake food consider tempting , detrimental weight loss effort , compare CB . The process similar experiment 1 except blood draw , dinner offer . Instead , tempt food lunch offer .
